about_the_game:
This game was entirely made on RPG Maker MV and it suffers from a native engine problem: the frame rate drop. We optimized the game as much as we could and we're still working on new improvements. If you experience a frame rate drop, we suggest saving the game and restarting it.



Steam Achievements are disabled until we find a solution for this frame rate problem. We hope understand the situation and thank you for your support.



Harem, Otome, Boys Love, Yaoi, Bara, Gay, Lesbian, Transgender, Amare, Dating Sims, B+B, G+G, B+G




  • Date system with 14 unique characters;
  • More than 20 unique endings;

  • Character creation with class and magical element customization;
  • Characters with unique classes and skills;
  • More than 90 characters to join your team;

  • Classic Mode for advanced players and Story Mode for those who want to focus on the narrative;
  • Skill improvements based on the level of relationship with the characters;
  • Random battles with different formations real-time created;
  • More than 30 hours of gameplay;
  • Unique Maps;


The continent of Libertas faces a threat: the Empire of Aeterna. Military and powerful, each day it annihilates the nearby kingdoms, destroying their cultures and taking over them. One by one, the kingdoms fell until the ones who weren't dominated decided to group themselves and fight back under the banner of the Libertasians Alliance. Angered by the group's attitude, the great Emperor Eligius Emeritus IV now seeks to find the 6 magic crystals created by the Goddess Vitalia to control the terrible serpent Obitus and force the entire world to bow down to him.
detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES



About the Game

This game was entirely made on RPG Maker MV and it suffers from a native engine problem: the frame rate drop. We optimized the game as much as we could and we're still working on new improvements. If you experience a frame rate drop, we suggest saving the game and restarting it.



Steam Achievements are disabled until we find a solution for this frame rate problem. We hope understand the situation and thank you for your support.



Harem, Otome, Boys Love, Yaoi, Bara, Gay, Lesbian, Transgender, Amare, Dating Sims, B+B, G+G, B+G




  • Date system with 14 unique characters;
  • More than 20 unique endings;

  • Character creation with class and magical element customization;
  • Characters with unique classes and skills;
  • More than 90 characters to join your team;

  • Classic Mode for advanced players and Story Mode for those who want to focus on the narrative;
  • Skill improvements based on the level of relationship with the characters;
  • Random battles with different formations real-time created;
  • More than 30 hours of gameplay;
  • Unique Maps;


The continent of Libertas faces a threat: the Empire of Aeterna. Military and powerful, each day it annihilates the nearby kingdoms, destroying their cultures and taking over them. One by one, the kingdoms fell until the ones who weren't dominated decided to group themselves and fight back under the banner of the Libertasians Alliance. Angered by the group's attitude, the great Emperor Eligius Emeritus IV now seeks to find the 6 magic crystals created by the Goddess Vitalia to control the terrible serpent Obitus and force the entire world to bow down to him.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Inspired by Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy Tactics but with NO GENDER RELATIONSHIP RULES, Save the world from an evil emperor Using the power of six elements while Dating whoever you want.
